welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rocky Point! Prepare to be charmed by our beautiful coastal city known for its stunning beaches and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and make unforgettable memories here. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is dedicated to domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is used for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.
